title: Scoops will matter more than ever
description: 2026 will bring more noise. More AI slop. More industry consolidation. More journos going down the independent route, as I did in early 2025. But scoops will matter more than ever. What sets apart one outlet, one newsletter, one reporter from another is the ability to break impactful news that stands the test of time....
